summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Gamelo digital game codes marketplace. All backend APIs pass (15/15 tests). Frontend UI working correctly including forgot password flow, admin login, dashboard stats, and product creation from UI.

minor.issue: Returns 404 - endpoint not implemented but called from frontend

action_items: Consider implementing /api/stats/public endpoint or removing the frontend call to avoid 404 errors
Add aria-describedby to Dialog components for better accessibility
critical_code_review_comments: Vite config was missing allowedHosts - fixed during testing to allow preview domain
React Router future flag warnings should be addressed before upgrading to v7
seed_data_creation: Test products created and cleaned up during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All core features tested and working: forgot password with OTP, admin login, dashboard stats display, products management with CRUD operations. The 422 error mentioned in the request was NOT reproduced - product creation from UI works correctly. Fixed vite.config.js to allow preview domain.
